name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Dark
name_original: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Dark
description: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki (英雄伝説 黎くろの軌跡, literally "Trails in the Dark") is the eleventh installment in the main Trails series. It was released in September 30, 2021 on PlayStation 4. The PlayStation 5 version release is scheduled for July 28, 2022.
